subject: Re: [junit] How to run the test cases using maven
msgSnippet: Hi Thanuja, ... This is more of a Maven question rather than a JUnit question so a better place to ask it would ve been the Maven users mailing list
messageBody:
Hi Thanuja,

On 6/13/07, p_thanuja82 <p_thanuja82@...> wrote:
> I am new to maven.Please anybody tell me how can I declare the
> test cases in maven-pom.xml. And how to run the test cases.

This is more of a Maven question rather than a JUnit question so a
better place to ask it would've been the Maven users mailing list
(http://maven.apache.org/mail-lists.html).

In any case, what you're looking for can be found from the
documentation for the maven-surefire-plugin:

http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-surefire-plugin/examples/inclusion-exclusion.html


Lasse
